title: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio built with Spring Boot, Thymeleaf, and Bootstrap to showcase projects and skills.
longDescription: A clean, responsive portfolio website built from scratch using Spring Boot and Thymeleaf. Features a reusable layout system, JSON-driven project data, and a modern Bootstrap 5 interface. Includes a home page with featured projects, a dedicated projects gallery with hover animations, a contact form integrated with Formspree, and a CV page.
features: CSS hover animations on project cards
